Name: Super!
Review_Description__c: Delivery is good. Installation completed. Good ac. Cools faster. No need to set temperature at 16 degree, it cools in 24 degree setup like a pro. Purely Indian brand. I like it. Simple design. Company is good. Cooling is very good. I have no issues at all. Blower noise problemhas been solved. Big brand quality product. I am happy with my purchase.

Name: Must buy!
Review_Description__c:
Best YouTube channel to fully satisfied knowledge- "VM-ONE" Presented by- Vineet Malhotra.
This mans videos for best AC related give me chose right decision to take  My First Inverter AC in my house, in future if i buy another one abosly i follow this man videos & then buy another one.
*AC Rating---
Cooling perfect with in 2 or 3 mint( my room 144 sqft)
Ac look Very simple and attractive (Outdoor and indoor unit both)
Minimum temperature 16 c and maximum 30c.
Sound of ac little bit but that ok , lower then the room normal siling fan sound.
My area electricity not so good show i brought a ac stabilizer for my AC.
AC remote is advancing technology & very easy to use.

If you want to know more then follow the YouTube channel which i mention first in the message.

Name: Great product
Review_Description__c: Best for domestic use. No need to put on 16. Very comfortable at 24. Simple looks. Installation by BlueStar was good but costly. Otherwise quick delivery and the product is best in class.

Name: Highly recommended
Review_Description__c: Good Model Good Design and Excellent Cooling System I m Happy to Purchased this Bluestar Model.

Name: Classy product
Review_Description__c: Nice product cooling is also good value for money. I am satisfied with ac performance .overall very good product

Name: Cools good, Feels good
Review_Description__c: Amazing product at this price. Works really smoothly and cools really fast. One downside, compared to some other brands, is that Blue Star does not provide warranty for PCB after the first year.

Name: Don't waste your money
Review_Description__c:
I have ordered it as I am using Voltas from 3 years but this time I purchased from Flipkart and it's seems they provide defective product in just 10 days it's not cooling my 150sq feet room for continuously running for 3 to 4 hours in 16 Degree celcius I have contacted service provider they came took my AC and give me on assurance it will work but still it's not working it's just 1 months old. I am totally frustrated with such a bogus product sold by Flipkart it seems it's not a genuine or defective peice.

So make sure to buy such electronics appliances from Flipkart they are selling bogus products

Name: Terrific purchase
Review_Description__c: The performance is very soft and excellent cooling experience that starts from 24 degrees. Totally worth for money but the indoor unit is very small in size, though it is 1.5 Ton but in size wise view it looks like 1 Ton and next coming to swing mode - There are 5 different positions of swing directions but while functioning in full swing mode it doesn't reach its 5th direction of swing, that is the only drawback and in remaining parameters it is the best one at this price..

Name: Worth every penny
Review_Description__c: Product is good. Consumes a lot of units if used at 24Â°C. I am using at 29-30Â°C and it consumes 1 unit in 2 hours which is really good. That one unit is consumed by the ac, fridge and ceiling fan combined. I strongly suggest people with less budget for electricity bill to use this at 29Â°C and ceiling fan together. Works brilliantly. Installation guys were not that great, they were in a hurry to leave without finishing their work. They couldn't find time to fit the stabilizer but upon insisting a lot they did hesitantly and the compressor wasn't working first, they didn't complete the wiring properly. Else a very good product, noise is bearable but you cannot position the swing manually you have to stop it in motion unlike my haier ac. Functions are a little limited compared to other brands, remote has a backlit display but goes off soon when unused.

Name: Worth the money
Review_Description__c: Existing Volta's window ac was replaced with 5 star energy rating one which fitted in to slot nicely.  Completely Satisfied

Product- The AC is working as expected, cooling is great, airflow is proper, convertible option is also working fine, cant say about energy efficiency at this time, hoping it to be efficient. Indoor unit is very silent, while the outdoor one is little bit noisy.

Name: Brilliant
Review_Description__c:
Good products of Voltas always appreciated.The name known for its best quality.Every one should purchase the Voltas AC.  All Tata products are excellent. Volas is always no.1 for AC.
We unable to install our AC window due to covid19 as we are in Red Zone.
So finally waiting too we have self install the same as earlier also we are using the same product.We easily install the same in our windows surface by using MCB and AC stabilizer. AC is working very good and excellent  by all means.
Kindly arrange to have registered the same for warranty by considering the Panedamic 2019_2020 (covid 19) problem.With thanks, please inform the registration no. and warranty details.

Name: Absolute rubbish!
Review_Description__c:
DISAPPOINTED.... NO COOLING.....seriously didn't expect this from blue star . I am giving this review after using it for a week, no cooling at all just gives air like normal old cooler fan, ran for more than 2 hours but no Cooling in room. Even in turbo its same no cooling just increased fan speed. Has lot of sound issue. Waste of money.... our 10+ year old LG 1 ton ac gives better cooling than this in 30 mins. Please don't buy this just seeing the 1.2 ton its waste of money better buy 1 ton or 1.5 ton.

      Installation is fine but NO demo at all. When we asked to explain the person about the fix and lock, he asked us to check with manual he wasn't even sure what was the fix and lock feature used for, no knowledge of operating.

Name: Super!
Review_Description__c: Flipkart delivery was hassle-free. AC installation was smooth, except issue of drain pipe which we fixed later. AC is quite powerful. Our room size is 130 sq. ft. with east facing window. Cooling is sufficient at 60% 26Â°C which we reduce to 40% with 3 hr sleep timer at night. AC don't have side swing, we have to manually set it. AC remote side swing button is dummy. AC remote is not backlit. Overall good experience, enjoying cool summer days.

Name: Hated it!
Review_Description__c: Leakage of water and blower broken from inside

Name: Perfect product!
Review_Description__c: Second  day delivery by flipkart  and same day Installation  by LG  IT'S super fast. Features wise and cooling wise its Amazing. If u looking  for long term AC go for it.

Name: Delightful
Review_Description__c: Very Nice product.....

Name: Expected a better product
Review_Description__c:
After using for 10 days I'm writing this review..
First of all Quite disappointed with this purchase, after an extensive research I thought to go with LG 1.5 ton 3star 5 in 1 convertible AC considering its warranty and brand value (compared to other brands it's giving 5 years on pcb) but the main purpose got deviated as it's cooling efficiency is not at all good... Sometimes it seems ok but sometimes it's not cooling as expected... We have a 10/12 room in which 1.5 ton is more than enough but room is not getting cooled effectively even after 30 minutes of usage... The person who are sitting right infront of the ac are only feeling the chill rest of the room is quite normal and not that effective...
And if we turn off the ac within no time the room get warm which is not the case with other(voltas/Daikin) Contacted Flipkart they asked to check with LG brand persons... Will edit the review based on their response...

Name: Fabulous!
Review_Description__c: Very good option in this budget...good cooling ... installation was done after few complaints...very little noise....

Name: Very Good
Review_Description__c:
Cheated. PM 2.5 and Anti bacteria filter are missing.
There is no meaning of super convertible. Its just to fool customer. Cooling is good. Quality looks good. Air flow is just okay. Over all not satisfied.

Rewriting review after 3 month usage. Energy efficient, cooling good. Silent performance no noise. Air flow very good. Over all very good

Name: Value-for-money
Review_Description__c:
Nice product at this price range. The cooling does take some time approx 35-45 min. My room size is 14*12 so it might take time. But cooling is not too effective. Also, it is too silent. The design is also good and comes with new digital display of temperature. 

We did not face any issues with installation as well. Had to pay 1500/- additional for installing and the stand cost of 750/- 

Would recommend to go for this brand.
